Subject: Insomniac Attack
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Ramhorn/Serpentor:




Imprisoner saw something smashing through the trees, right above him!  
Leaping, the crashing tank barely missed his foot.  Getting up, he fired off 
a blast from his sonic blaster at Firearm's left side tank treads, rolling 
out of the way of Brix, watching him fire like a mad man, his back now 
towards Firearm.  

Predator went to beast mode, firing off a single grenade at the area where 
Firearm's cannon begins to extend from the top half of his tank mode.

Choran pulled out a missile launcher from subspace, a blast from Brix sending 
chunks of tree hitting against his left arm.  Raising his launcher, he fired 
off a rocket at Brix's back.

=======

Koga Shuko yelled, a few bullets hitting his scaly side.  Running into the 
Ark, he picked up Ramhorn, using his as a shield, putting a knife to his 
back, where his spark would be if he stabbed forward all the way, and put his 
laser rifle to the back of his head.
"Back off!  Or we execute him like the Maximal pig he is!"

Hades raised his missile launcher, a photon charge slamming him into the 
battered hull of the Ark, a metal plate snapping off and falling to the 
ground.  The Newcomer raised his missile launcher, firing a single rocket off 
at Hot Rod's pelvis.

Anubis ducks, several bullets striking his left arm, leaving cracks in his 
armor.  The Predacon fired off a rocket at Rhinox's chest.

---

Unitron entered the run-down bridge of the Ark.  He took out two grenades set 
too explode on impact, throwing them into the bridge, jumping out, the 
grenades going off.  Unitron then ran for the engine room, laughing.

===

Serpentor yelled, shoulder blasts knocking him back a few feet, digging into 
his left chest.  Raising his plasma rifle, he fired off three shots at 
Striker's abdomen.
